detaileddescription.para: A toolbox for doing extracting, processing, classifying, visualising, and storing eyetracking data.

Homepage
http://petejonze.github.io/ivis/ To reference (and for further info)
Jones, P.R. (in prep). Ivis v1.0: A Matlab toolkit for eyetracking experiments. For info on code
ivis - main package, containing the code ivis_util - additional utility functions ivisDemos - demos showing how it all works
To install
download from the GitHub hompage, and run InstallIvis For technical (API) documentation
